rate_type.label: [Rating] Rate Request Type
rate_type.comment: Selecting 'Account Rates' will return rates, plus surcharges, minus discounts. 'List Rates' do not include discounts

handling_shelf.label: [Rating] Logarithmic Handling
handling_shelf.comment: Scales down handling percentage logarithmically (Handling Percent = Handling Percent / log(Price))

residence_delivery.label: [Rating] Residential Delivery
residence_delivery.comment: Enables residential surcharge for all addresses, and forces usage of the 'Home Delivery' method for 'Ground' shipments.

saturday_delivery.label: [Rating] Saturday Delivery
saturday_delivery.comment: When enabled, rate requests will only return methods that are capable of Saturday delivery

free_shipping_subtotal.label: [Shipping] Minimum order amount for Free Shipping

filter_po_boxes.label: [Shipping] Filter PO Boxes
filter_po_boxes.comment: Select "Yes" to prevent shipments to PO Boxes

enable_smartpost.label: [SmartPost] Enable
enable_smartpost.comment: 'SmartPost' must also be enabled in Allowed Methods

smartpost_customer_manifest_id.label: [SmartPost] Manifest ID
smartpost_customer_manifest_id.comment: In most cases this field should be left blank

shipper_company.label: [Printing] Use Store Name for Shipper Company
shipper_company.comment: If 'Yes' the Store Name will be used as the shipper's company name. If 'No', the Website Name will be used

label_stock_type.label: [Printing] Label Stock Type
label_stock_type.comment: For thermal printers a STOCK method must be selected. International shippers should select a LABEL or DOC_TAB method. Changes to this setting will only apply to new shipments.

enable_java_printing.label: [Printing] Enable jZebra
enable_java_printing.comment: Enables jZebra support for RAW printing to thermal printers

printer_name.label: [Printing] Thermal Printer Name
printer_name.comment: Enter the Windows (or CUPS) printer name. Printer name may not contain spaces

address_validation.label: Enable Address Validation
address_validation.comment: Validates addresses using FedEx's Address Validation service. This service is only available by request from your FedEx representative

enable_soap_cache.label: Enable API Cache
enable_soap_cache.comment: Improves speed by caching API requests. Temporarily disable if you experience trouble updating credentials or switching modes.

debug_firebug.label: Enable Firebug Debugging
debug_firebug.comment: Outputs API request and response to Firebug console. WARNING: Do not enable on a live site

showmethod.label: Show Method if Not Applicable
showmethod.comment: Disable to hide shipping method when no rates are available
